title: i have some questions about ranked lp
body: (im silver 4) i was playing ranked and i lost 1 and won 1, but how come in total i lost 8 lp

replies.body: Some of the factors here depend on your progress so far and if matchmaking things whether your team or the opposing team will win.  For example, if matchmaking thinks your team should win but you end up losing, you may end up losing more points.  More info is also available at our[ ranked play guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204010760-Ranked-Play-FAQ), be sure to check it out!
becasue getting lp and losing ap depands on your performance, if you lost a game, your current performance isn't so good, so you get less lp with a win and lose more at a lose.
